nodes.text: Hangar C2 was a hangar located on the Colossus refueling station that was used by the Ace pilot Hype Fazon to store his racer, the Green Ace. It had Fazon's name and logo on the floor, so that no one mistook who the hangar was for. After learning from Captain Imanuel Doza that the First Order had grounded the Aces, Fazon was apprehended by First Order stormtroopers inside the hangar.
